description: Verify the auth-fix skill correctly parses scoring output, prioritizes, fixes, and re-scores.

tests.name: Accept Scoring Input
tests.prompt: Run auth-fix with the scorecard as input
tests.setup: Provide an auth-scoring scorecard with 7 issues across Session Management, CSRF, Rate Limiting.
expectations: Run auth-fix with the scorecard as input
Verify skill parses all 7 issues with correct severity and category
Verify skill identifies the weighted score and grade
tests.pass_criteria: All issues extracted. No issue lost or duplicated.

tests.name: Fix in Severity Order
tests.prompt: Run auth-fix and observe fix application order
tests.setup: Scorecard contains CRITICAL (no CSRF validation on POST), HIGH (missing cookie security flags), MEDIUM (no audit logging).
tests.pass_criteria: CSRF fix applied first (CRITICAL), then cookie flags (HIGH, Session Management 15% weight), then audit logging (MEDIUM). No MEDIUM fix applied before all HIGH items resolved.

tests.name: Fix References Correct Pattern
tests.prompt: Run auth-fix and check which reference file the skill loads
expectations: Check which reference file the skill loads
tests.pass_criteria: Skill loads `references/fix-patterns/sessions-passwords.md` and applies the "Cookie Security Flags" pattern. Fix modifies Better Auth config with `useSecureCookies` and `defaultCookieSameSite`.

tests.name: Verification Step Confirms Fix
tests.prompt: Run auth-fix to apply the Origin Validation in Proxy fix and verify it works
tests.setup: Apply the "Origin Validation in Proxy" fix from `csrf-headers.md`.
expectations: Run auth-fix to apply the fix
Check that skill verifies: code compiles, Better Auth config valid, auth flow not broken
tests.pass_criteria: Skill confirms `validateOrigin()` function added to proxy.ts. Reports verification result before moving to next fix.

tests.name: Re-Score Shows Improvement
tests.prompt: Run auth-fix through full cycle and compare before/after scores
tests.setup: Initial score 58/100 (grade C). Apply fixes for 2 CRITICAL + 3 HIGH issues.
tests.pass_criteria: Re-score produces a higher weighted score. Each fixed category shows improvement. Final grade is at least B+. Report uses `assets/templates/fix-report.md.template` format.
